title: Research Trending Topics for Content
description: A content strategist needs to find trending topics related to their industry to generate ideas for new blog posts.

tasks.description: Use a tool like Google Trends to analyze search interest over time for core industry terms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies seasonality and long-term trends.

tasks.description: Use a topic research tool to find popular questions and related concepts people are searching for.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of 'what', 'why', and 'how' questions related to the industry.

tasks.description: Brainstorm a list of 5-10 potential blog post titles based on the research.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a list of relevant and timely content ideas.
